notes: Chinese manufacturer of ashwagandha extracts with multiple standardization options (1-20% withanolides via HPLC), ratio extracts, and straight powder. Serves pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, and cosmetic applications. Applications: high-potency skincare, standardized formulations. Competitive pricing ($30-60/kg depending on standardization) with MOQ typically 25kg+ for wholesale. GMP and ISO certified. China-based manufacturing with global shipping. COA, specifications, and customization available. Multiple standardization options provide formulation flexibility.
